survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Wellness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the current on-site wellness programs offered by the company, identifying strengths and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of on-site wellness programs offered by the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of on-site wellness programs offered by the company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following on-site wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture participation across different programs.

script.question_text: Which of the following on-site wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site wellness programs?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in on-site wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Use single-choice to measure frequency of participation.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in on-site wellness programs?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's on-site wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood. This helps gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's on-site wellness programs to a colleague?
